name: Hunt It
description:
HUNT IT is the best deer hunting game ever! Hunt deer in this amazing hunting game. Shoot any deer you want and take it home. Shoot, shoot, shoot, and hunt the deer.

Hunt the deer in this amazing game in 4 different scenarios: California, Canada, Alaska, Terranova. Complete 10 challenged in each scenario to become the ultimate Hunter!

Choose among 11 different weapons to kill the deer. Choose either the most classic rifles or the most modern snipers. You can also use the infrared vision to aim for specific body parts when shooting and get extra bonuses!
In HUNT IT you can go fantasy hunting to try and become the ultimate hunter. Hunt different animals such as dinosaurs to be the best hunter in Google Play.

HUNT IT is a free hunting simulation game. Simulate to shoot all the deer. Score lots of deer points and upgrade your deer hunting weapons.

Features:
- Real hunting environment.
- 4 different scenarios.
- Fantasy Hunt.
- Deer sim to hunt.
- 11 Amazing hunting weapons.
- Realistic sounds and deer.
